Sidebar.No_content: No servers or direct channels found

Errors.Icon_load_failed: Failed to load server icon, falling back to letter

Welcome.Title: Welcome to your Chat App!
Welcome.Subtitle: Get started by creating a server, joining one, or starting a direct conversation.
Welcome.Info: You can always access these options from the sidebar or settings.

CreateModal.Title: Create New
CreateModal.Required_Fields: Please fill in all required fields
CreateModal.Permission_Message: You need to grant permission to access your photo library to select an image.
CreateModal.Camera_Permission_Message: You need to grant camera permission to take photos.

JoinServer.Title: Join Server
JoinServer.Description: Enter an invite link to join a server. You can get invite links from server members or administrators.
JoinServer.Already_Member: You are already a member of this server

ServerContent.Select_Channel: Select a channel to start messaging

Errors.Permission_Denied: You don't have permission to perform this action

ServerManagement.Title: Server Management
ServerManagement.Invite_Info: This invite link will expire in 7 days. Share it with people you want to join the server.
ServerManagement.Confirm_Delete: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.
ServerManagement.Cannot_Remove_Owner_Default_Role: Cannot remove the default role from the server owner
ServerManagement.Override_Server_Permissions: Override server permissions for this channel
ServerManagement.Channel_Overrides_Description: These permissions override the server-wide defaults for specific channels

MANAGE_SERVER.Name: Manage Server
MANAGE_SERVER.Description: Allow users to change server settings

KICK_MEMBERS.Name: Kick Members
KICK_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to kick members from server

BAN_MEMBERS.Name: Ban Members
BAN_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to ban members from server

MANAGE_ROLES.Name: Manage Roles
MANAGE_ROLES.Description: Allow users to create and edit roles

CREATE_INVITE.Name: Create Invites
CREATE_INVITE.Description: Allow users to create invite links

INVITE_LINKS.Name: Manage Invite Links
INVITE_LINKS.Description: Allow users to manage and revoke invite links

MANAGE_MESSAGES.Name: Manage Messages
MANAGE_MESSAGES.Description: Allow users to delete and edit messages

CONNECT.Name: Connect to Voice
CONNECT.Description: Allow users to connect to voice channels

SPEAK.Name: Speak in Voice
SPEAK.Description: Allow users to speak in voice channels

MUTE_MEMBERS.Name: Mute Members
MUTE_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to mute other members

DEAFEN_MEMBERS.Name: Deafen Members
DEAFEN_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to deafen other members

VIEW_CHANNEL.Name: View Channel
VIEW_CHANNEL.Description: Allow users to view this channel

SEND_MESSAGES.Name: Send Messages
SEND_MESSAGES.Description: Allow users to send messages in this channel

MANAGE_MESSAGES.Name: Manage Messages
MANAGE_MESSAGES.Description: Allow users to delete and edit messages in this channel

CONNECT.Name: Connect to Voice
CONNECT.Description: Allow users to connect to this voice channel

SPEAK.Name: Speak in Voice
SPEAK.Description: Allow users to speak in this voice channel

MUTE_MEMBERS.Name: Mute Members
MUTE_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to mute other members in this channel

DEAFEN_MEMBERS.Name: Deafen Members
DEAFEN_MEMBERS.Description: Allow users to deafen other members in this channel

Chat.No_Messages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
Chat.File_Feature_Coming_Soon: File attachment feature will be implemented soon for mobile
